Custom Google Search
  1. Apprenticeship Standards

Subscribe to email notification

As required by Labor Code section 3075, the Division posts on this web-page copies of proposed new apprenticeship standards (including proposed amendments to apprenticeship standards to include new work processes or occupations). Interested parties may subscribe to email notification of new postings on this page by using the button at the top of the page.

Proposed New and Revised Program Standards

Comments can be sent to: DASStandardList@dir.ca.gov.
